channel.title: Easter Eggs or Funny Things
channel.description:
[spoiler="Mac. Blesa Fire Ext."] I found "Mac. Blesa" on a fire extinguisher near the start of the game. Don't worry. I'm not playing on an 800x600 game display. I made steam crop the image down low. Mac most likely stands for Mack. It would then be Mack Blesa. Mack Blesa is an anagram for Black Mesa.
[img]https://i.gyazo.com/ec511ca1a5bd685d5f5d2e9a81f8c4cb.png[/img]
[img]https://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/512629963255145564/56FF66A150631978584B5050F7D64E72987B91EC/?interpolation=lanczos-none&output-format=jpeg&output-quality=95&fit=inside|800:600&composite-to=*,*|800:600&background-color=black[/img] [/spoiler]
[spoiler="Ctrl+Alt+Delete"] At the bm_c1a0a, when the guard has computer problems, the scientist there suggested pressing Control Alt and Delete. [/spoiler]
[spoiler="Gman found at bm_c1a0a"] [img]https://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/512629963255275607/CA83B76538DD950DE4BA6E4B36B4A116E4CA6AD6/?interpolation=lanczos-none&output-format=jpeg&output-quality=95&fit=inside|800:600&composite-to=*,*|800:600&background-color=black[/img] [/spoiler]

What’s the difference between the circus and congress? One’s a cunning array of stunts…

item.title: Easter Eggs or Funny Things
item.dc:creator: raw_bean
item.description:
Random joke yes, but it’s definitely meant to be an anagram or specifically a spoonerism (swapping of the starting consonant sounds of two words), like “cunning stunt”, or what happens when you try and say this little rhyme too quickly:

“I’m not a pheasant plucker,
I’m a pleasant plucker’s son.
And I’ll be plucking pheasant
'Till the pheasant plucking’s done.”

Read full topic

item.title: Easter Eggs or Funny Things
item.dc:creator: vamp
item.description:
The fire extinguisher is just a random joke.
the MaC Blesa.

Mac from Macdonalds, Blesa sounding like a fun word for blazing mixed with mesa.

Read full topic

item.title: Easter Eggs or Funny Things
item.dc:creator: abc
item.description:
I found “Mac. Blesa” on a fire extinguisher near the start of the game.
Don’t worry. I’m not playing on an 800x600 game display. I made steam crop the image down low.
Mac most likely stands for Mack.
It would then be Mack Blesa.
Mack Blesa is an anagram for Black Mesa.

800×600

At the bm_c1a0a, when the guard has computer problems, the scientist there suggested pressing Control Alt and Delete.

800×600

Read full topic
